column4: Hello people, I just installed ubuntu desktop and my resonlution is being capped at 800x600 I used to be gettin much bigger than this on widows. Anyone know how i can change it ?
run: lspci | grep -i vga    websearch for the output
you have the driver installed and configured in windows, but not in Ubuntu
run: lspci | grep -i vga      websearch for the output to find guides
